lut_1d_h_tab.description: knee point 1D LUT for hue which will define the original point you want to move
lut_1d_h_tab.additional_notes: i. LUT are always programmed in ascending order. ii. No two entries for the LUT can be equal; iii. Hue's first LUT is always 0; iv. Hue's last LUT(25 for h/w) is always 360.

lut_1d_s_tab.description: knee point 1D LUT for saturation which will define the original point you want to move
lut_1d_s_tab.additional_notes: i. LUT is always programmed in ascending order; ii. No two entries of LUT can be equal; iii. Saturationâ€™s first entry will define gray area which will not change at all; iv. Saturation's last LUT is always Max (2048).

k_b_integer.description: to calculate Y offset to recover Y value, RGB to Y coefficient can be tuned.

k_r_integer.description: to calculate Y offset to recover Y value, RGB to Y coefficient can be tuned.

h_shift.description: adjust 2d delta hue range. When h_shift=5, delta hue range is +-360 degree. When h_shift=1, delta hue range is +-30 degree.

s_shift.description: adjust 2d delta saturation range. When s_shift=2, delta saturation range is +-1.0. When s_shift=0, delta saturation range is +-0.25.

lut_2d_h_tab.additional_notes: row 24 should be the same as row 0 data

lut_2d_s_tab.additional_notes: row 24 should be the same as row 0 data

l_boundary_start_a.description: to eliminate hue and saturation change on low Luminance, set Luminance start boundary which only will not change hue and saturation by 2D LUT. Lower value make more hue and saturation change.
l_boundary_start_a.additional_notes: Setting this value to 1.0f means no hue and saturation change at all.

l_boundary_start_b.description: to eliminate hue and saturation change on low Luminance, set Luminance start boundary which only will not change hue and saturation by 2D LUT. Lower value make more hue and saturation change.
l_boundary_start_b.additional_notes: Setting this value to 1.0f means no hue and saturation change at all.

l_boundary_end_a.description: to eliminate hue and saturation change on high Luminance, set Luminance end boundary which only will not change hue and saturation by 2D LUT. Higher value make more hue and saturation change.
l_boundary_end_a.additional_notes: Setting this value to 0.0f means no hue and saturation change at all.

l_boundary_end_b.description: to eliminate hue and saturation change on high Luminance, set Luminance end boundary which only will not change hue and saturation by 2D LUT. Higher value make more hue and saturation change.
l_boundary_end_b.additional_notes: Setting this value to 0.0f means no hue and saturation change at all.

y_blend_factor_integer.description: hue and saturation change can cause Y value change. To prevent Y value change, calculate Y offset between input Y and output Y and recover output Y value as same as input Y according to this factor. Lower value means less Y recovery and higher value means more Y recovery.
y_blend_factor_integer.additional_notes: Setting this value to 0.0f means hue and saturation will be changed as intended even though Y value changes. On the other hands, setting this value to 1.0f means hue and saturation will not be changed as intended because of Y recovery.
